item.title: Kristin add a quote by Fannie Flagg
item.description: "and Lenore had served each child several cups of the Simmons eggnog, which was 75 percent rum and 25 percent nog. When they came to pick the children up, all four were stumbling around her living room in a drunken stupor." -- Fannie Flagg

item.title: Kristin add a quote by Dyan Cannon
item.description: "Through several hours of revelry, I somehow got the idea that I could keep up with an English journalist. (Put English and journalist together and you get a liver as powerful as a nuclear reactor.) Cary was his usual moderate self, but I plowed along with Roddy, and I got as drunk as a rugby team after a tournament win." -- Dyan Cannon
